snippet.title: Catamyst - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Catamyst on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2959740/Catamyst/

Catamyst is an action roguelike that requires players to craft potions and defeat waves of molecular amalgamations. Playing as Willow, you'll be combining real-world chemistry with magical potions to destroy the monstrosities that have emerged.
Releasing August 19th 2024 on Steam.

Follow Catamyst on Twitter: https://twitter.com/CatamystGame/

Credits:
Developed by Winter Jones @bugsaretasty 
Composer & Audio Designer: Madeline Caubarrère @Cochu 

Follow Winter on Twitter: https://twitter.com/bugsaretasty
Follow Cochu on Twitter: https://twitter.com/CochuU_
